languages.text: "Я выделяюсь среди прочих твоих слуг". {n}Кибелла обводит взглядом собравшихся — те отводят глаза.{/n} "Подходящая маска... вот что нужно, чтобы участвовать в этом ритуале. Я прибыла неподготовленной. Это не повторится".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибелла обводит взглядом собравшихся — те отводят взгляды и прячут глаза под взором культистки — после чего смотрит на вас.{/n} "Маска... вот что нужно, чтобы слиться с участниками этого ритуала. Стать полноправным членом его. Я прибыла неподготовленной. Но этого больше не повторится".

languages.text: "I am too conspicuous beside the rest of your servants." {n}Kibellah looks at the other guests, and they quickly avert their eyes.{/n} "A fitting mask — that is what is required for a ritual like this. I came unprepared. It will not happen again."
languages.original_text: "Я выделяюсь среди прочих твоих слуг". {n}Кибелла обводит взглядом собравшихся — те отводят глаза.{/n} "Подходящая маска... вот что нужно, чтобы участвовать в этом ритуале. Я прибыла неподготовленной. Это не повторится".

traits.locale_text: "I am too conspicuous against the rest of your servants." {n}Kibellah looks at the guests, and they quickly avert their eyes.{/n} "A fitting mask — that is what is required for a ritual like this. I came unprepared. It will not happen again."

"I am too conspicuous against the rest of your servants." {n}Kibellah looks at the guests, and they quickly avert their eyes.{/n} "A fitting mask — that is what is required for a ritual like this. I came unprepared. It will not happen again."

"I am too conspicuous beside the rest of your servants." {n}Kibellah looks at the other guests, and they quickly avert their eyes.{/n} "A fitting mask — that is what is required for a ritual like this. I came unprepared. It will not happen again."
{n}Kibellah looks at the guests, and they quickly avert their eyes.{/n} "A mask — that is what is required for a ritual like this. I came unprepared. It will not happen again."

"I am too conspicuous beside the rest of your servants." {n}Kibellah looks at the other guests, and they quickly avert their eyes.{/n} "A fitting mask — that is what is required for a ritual like this. I came unprepared. It will not happen again."

"I am too conspicuous beside the rest of your servants." {n}Kibellah looks at the other guests, and they quickly avert their eyes.{/n} "A fitting mask — that is what is required for a ritual like this. I came unprepared. It will not happen again."

"I am too conspicuous beside the rest of your servants." {n}Kibellah looks at the other guests, and they quickly avert their eyes.{/n} "A fitting mask — that is what is required for a ritual like this. I came unprepared. It will not happen again."

languages.text: «Comparada con el resto de sus sirvientes, yo sobresalgo bastante». {n}Kibellah mira al resto de invitados, que apartan rápidamente la vista.{/n} «Una máscara apropiada: eso es lo que se necesita para un ritual como este. No vine preparada. No volverá a ocurrir».
languages.original_text: "I am too conspicuous beside the rest of your servants." {n}Kibellah looks at the other guests, and they quickly avert their eyes.{/n} "A fitting mask — that is what is required for a ritual like this. I came unprepared. It will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: «Comparada con el resto de sus sirvientes, yo sobresalgo bastante». {n}Kibellah mira al resto de invitados, que apartan rápidamente la vista.{/n} «Una máscara apropiada: eso es lo que se necesita para un ritual como este. No vine preparada. No volverá a ocurrir».

languages.text: 「私は他の従者たちの中で目立ちすぎています」{n}キベラがゲストたちを見ると彼らは急いでその視線を他方に向ける。{/n}「仮面…それがこういった儀式に必要なのですね。準備不足でした。二度と同じようなことにはなりません」
languages.original_text: "I am too conspicuous beside the rest of your servants." {n}Kibellah looks at the other guests, and they quickly avert their eyes.{/n} "A fitting mask — that is what is required for a ritual like this. I came unprepared. It will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: 「私は他の従者たちの中で目立ちすぎています」{n}キベラがゲストたちを見ると彼らは急いでその視線を他方に向ける。{/n}「仮面…それがこういった儀式に必要なのですね。準備不足でした。二度と同じようなことにはなりません」

languages.text: “与你的其他仆从相比，我实在是太显眼了。”{n}绮贝菈扫视着众多宾客，被她看到的人很快移开了视线。{/n}“需要合适的面具……像这样的仪式，需要提前准备好面具。我来的时候毫无准备，不过，这种事情不会再发生了。”
languages.original_text: "I am too conspicuous beside the rest of your servants." {n}Kibellah looks at the other guests, and they quickly avert their eyes.{/n} "A fitting mask — that is what is required for a ritual like this. I came unprepared. It will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: “与你的其他仆从相比，我实在是太显眼了。”{n}绮贝菈扫视着众多宾客，被她看到的人很快移开了视线。{/n}“需要合适的面具……像这样的仪式，需要提前准备好面具。我来的时候毫无准备，不过，这种事情不会再发生了。”

languages.text: Ich falle zwischen Euren anderen Dienern zu sehr auf. {n}Kibellah betrachtet die übrigen Gäste, die ihrem Blick ausweichen.{/n} "Eine passende Maske ... das ist es, was ich für ein Ritual wie dieses brauche. Ich war nicht vorbereitet. Das wird nicht noch einmal geschehen."
languages.original_text: "I am too conspicuous beside the rest of your servants." {n}Kibellah looks at the other guests, and they quickly avert their eyes.{/n} "A fitting mask — that is what is required for a ritual like this. I came unprepared. It will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: Ich falle zwischen Euren anderen Dienern zu sehr auf. {n}Kibellah betrachtet die übrigen Gäste, die ihrem Blick ausweichen.{/n} "Eine passende Maske ... das ist es, was ich für ein Ritual wie dieses brauche. Ich war nicht vorbereitet. Das wird nicht noch einmal geschehen."

languages.text: « Je détonne, comparée au reste de vos serviteurs. » {n}Kibellah observe les autres convives, qui s'empressent aussitôt de détourner le regard.{/n} « Un masque de circonstance... Tel est l'accessoire indispensable de ce genre de rituels. Je n'y avais pas songé. Cela ne se reproduira pas. »
languages.original_text: "I am too conspicuous beside the rest of your servants." {n}Kibellah looks at the other guests, and they quickly avert their eyes.{/n} "A fitting mask — that is what is required for a ritual like this. I came unprepared. It will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: « Je détonne, comparée au reste de vos serviteurs. » {n}Kibellah observe les autres convives, qui s'empressent aussitôt de détourner le regard.{/n} « Un masque de circonstance... Tel est l'accessoire indispensable de ce genre de rituels. Je n'y avais pas songé. Cela ne se reproduira pas. »

languages.text: "Geri kalan hizmetkârlarının yanında fazla dikkat çekiyorum." {n}Kibellah diğer konuklara bakıyor. Konuklar çabucak bakışlarını kaçırıyor.{/n} "Duruma uygun bir maske. Böylesi bir ayine gereken türden. Hazırlıksız geldim. Bir daha olmayacak."
languages.original_text: "I am too conspicuous beside the rest of your servants." {n}Kibellah looks at the other guests, and they quickly avert their eyes.{/n} "A fitting mask — that is what is required for a ritual like this. I came unprepared. It will not happen again."
